scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts two figures in a verdant, grassy setting. On the left, a kneeling figure with a halo, dressed in blue and brown robes, clasps their hands in prayer and looks towards a golden vessel. On the right, a standing figure with a halo, wearing a dark robe and holding a shovel, raises their right hand as if in blessing or instruction. The standing figure has red marks on their feet, possibly indicating stigmata. The background is a textured, light-colored surface, possibly representing a wall or sky, with decorative elements on the far left edge. The scene is likely devotional, possibly depicting a saint or a biblical event.
